name: add-field
description: Add a new field to an object at a specified path, creating intermediate objects as needed

path.description: Dot-separated path to the object where field should be added (use empty string for root level)

field_name.description: Name of the field to add

value.description: Value to set for the new field

output.description: Modified object with new field added at the specified path

examples.description: Add field to root level object
Create intermediate objects and add field
